templateOptions.label: ClientId
templateOptions.description: The ClientId to connect to StudyTube

templateOptions.label: ClientSecret
templateOptions.description: The ClientSecret to connect to StudyTube

templateOptions.label: BaseUrl
templateOptions.description: The URL to the StudyTube API.

templateOptions.label: TokenUrl
templateOptions.description: The URL to StudyTube for retrieving the accessToken.

templateOptions.label: Update account during correlating
templateOptions.description: This will update the account in the target application during correlation

templateOptions.label: Toggle debug logging
templateOptions.description: When toggled, debug logging will be displayed

templateOptions.label: User Page Size
templateOptions.description: Page size for Retrieving users (default: between 25 and 200)
